data.message: how about letting us decide if we want to see our "memories" from five years ago? It's jarring if it happens to be a ex, from an earth shattering break up or, someone who died tragically at a young age? If  you are arbitrarily choosing "my" memories, I'd love the option to opt out.

replies.message: Hi there, Kim. You can learn more about how to adjust On This Day notifications here: http://bit.ly/23XjIN1. -Kate
